Key Match Events: Brendan Donovan hit a three-run homer
Iv√°n Herrera hit an RBI double in the sixth and scored on a throwing error by Yankees catcher Austin Wells
Post-Match Reflections: Donovan said after the game that it was a special win for the organization, their first in the Bronx in 60 years
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals improved to 1-7 at Yankee Stadium in the regular season
Ryan Helsley became the first Cardinal to record a save in the Bronx since Ron Taylor pitched the final four innings of Game 4 of the 1964 World Series
Others: The Cardinals will go to arbitration with Nootbaar, Donovan, and Pallante
Paul Goldschmidt has signed with the Yankees
